common.coreFeaturesDesc: 让您的大数据组件管理运维变得简单高效的核心特性

slogan.description: 新一代云原生大数据管家，致力于帮助用户快速构建起稳定、高效、可弹性伸缩的大数据云原生平台

feature.title: 简单易用
feature.details: 仅需几步即可快速完成数千个节点规模的大数据集群部署，界面化操作、轻松管理各种大数据组件，大幅提升运维工作效率

feature.title: 高兼容性
feature.details: 全面兼容开源生态，已支持多种常用大数据组件、并且适配各种复杂环境，支持常用Linux生态操作系统及arm和x86机器

feature.title: 云原生
feature.details: 支持大数据服务以容器化方式运行，基于Kubernetes内核实现大数据组件的自动运维调优，避免组件繁琐的运维调优工作

common.coreFeaturesDesc: Modern features that will make your project easier.

slogan.description: 致力于快速实现部署、管理、监控以及自动化运维大数据云原生平台，帮助您快速构建起稳定、高效、可弹性伸缩的大数据云原生平台

feature.title: Easy to use
feature.details: Complete deployment of big data clusters with thousands of nodes in just a few steps. GUI operations make it easy to manage various big data components, greatly improving O&M efficiency.

feature.title: High compatibility
feature.details: Fully compatible with the open-source ecosystem. Supports many common big data components and adapts to complex environments, including common Linux distributions and both ARM and x86 machines.

feature.title: Cloud native
feature.details: Supports running big data services in containers and leverages Kubernetes for automated O&M and tuning, avoiding tedious manual optimization.
